name: One Bowl Vegan Orange Cake
description: Vegan Orange Cake made in 1 Bowl and just 8 ingredients! Easy Moist Citrusy Vegan Cake. Soyfree Palm-Oil-free Recipe. Makes 1 8 or 9 inch cake pan.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup whole wheat pastry flour or use Spelt flour
1/2 cup unbleached white flour or all purpose flour
1 tbsp starch like corn or arrowroot
3/4 cup powdered sugar (I powder raw sugar and use, Add 2 to 4 tbsp more for sweeter.)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Line a 8 or 9 inch cake pan with parchment, or grease well and dust with flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc. Line a 8 or 9 inch cake pan with parchment, or grease well and dust with flour.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients until combined well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients until combined well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wet ingredients to the bowl and mix until smooth. Pour the batter in the prepared cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wet ingredients to the bowl and mix until smooth. Pour the batter in the prepared cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or a toothpick from near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan. Cool completely before slicing.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or a toothpick from near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan. Cool completely before slicing.

recipeInstructions.text: Add frosting of choice like vegan cream cheese frosting, or with whipped coconut cream and fruit, or make a boozy marmalade glaze.
recipeInstructions.name: Add frosting of choice like vegan cream cheese frosting, or with whipped coconut cream and fruit, or make a boozy marmalade glaze.

recipeInstructions.text: For the boozy glaze: Mix a tbsp of liquor in a 1/4 cup of orange or apricot marmalade or preserves of choice. Heat for a few minutes until bubbling. Use as glaze or serve with each slice.
recipeInstructions.name: For the boozy glaze: Mix a tbsp of liquor in a 1/4 cup of orange or apricot marmalade or preserves of choice. Heat for a few minutes until bubbling. Use as glaze or serve with each slice.

recipeInstructions.text: For a regular glaze: Use a tbsp orange juice mixed with the marmalade, or mix 2 to 3 tbsp orange juice with a 1/3 cup or more powdered sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: For a regular glaze: Use a tbsp orange juice mixed with the marmalade, or mix 2 to 3 tbsp orange juice with a 1/3 cup or more powdered sugar.
